DEFAULT.description: Default color for text and icons.

subtle.description: Secondary color for text and icons with lower emphasis.

subtlest.description: Tertiary color for text and icons with minimal emphasis.

pressed.description: Color for text and icons in brand state when pressed.

inverse.description: Color for text and icons on dark or contrasting backgrounds.

DEFAULT.description: Color for text and icons in accent state.

hovered.description: Color for text and icons in accent state when hovered.

pressed.description: Color for text and icons in accent state when pressed.

inverse.description: Color for text and icons on dark or contrasting backgrounds.

bold.description: Color for text and icons in accent state with high contrast.

disabled.description: Color for text and icons in disabled state.

hovered.description: Color for informational text and icons when hovered.

pressed.description: Color for informational text and icons when pressed.

inverse.description: Color for text and icons on dark or contrasting backgrounds.

hovered.description: Color for success text and icons when hovered.

pressed.description: Color for success text and icons when pressed.

inverse.description: Color for text and icons on dark or contrasting backgrounds.

hovered.description: Color for warning text and icons when hovered.

pressed.description: Color for warning text and icons when pressed.

inverse.description: Color for text and icons on dark or contrasting backgrounds.

hovered.description: Color for error text and icons when hovered.

pressed.description: Color for error text and icons when pressed.

inverse.description: Color for text and icons on dark or contrasting backgrounds.

DEFAULT.description: Base background color for the main page or app surface.

hovered.description: Background color when the default surface is hovered.

pressed.description: Background color when the default surface is pressed.

focused.description: Background color for focused input fields or similar elements that are focused

disabled.description: Background color for disabled or read-only input fields or similar elements that are disabled

DEFAULT.description: Background color for subtle surfaces

hovered.description: Background color when subtle surfaces are hovered.

pressed.description: Background color when subtle surfaces are pressed.

DEFAULT.description: Background color for subtle surfaces

hovered.description: Background color when subtle surfaces are hovered.

pressed.description: Background color when subtle surfaces are pressed.

DEFAULT.description: Background color for inverted surfaces

hovered.description: Background color when inverted surfaces are hovered.

pressed.description: Background color when inverted surfaces are pressed.

DEFAULT.description: Background color for elevated surfaces

hovered.description: Background color when raised surfaces are hovered

pressed.description: Background color when raised surfaces are pressed

hovered.description: Background color when modal surfaces are hovered

pressed.description: Background color when modal surfaces are pressed

sunken.description: Background color for surfaces that appear pressed into the page, like input fields or selected tabs. Use this over 'subtle' or 'subtlest' when you need to create visual depth by making elements appear recessed.

selected.description: Use as backdrop to communicate selected states when a simple background color change isn't possible.

DEFAULT.description: Color for skeleton loading states

subtle.description: Use for the pulse or shimmer effect in skeleton loading states

DEFAULT.description: Background color for branded surfaces.

hovered.description: Background color when branded surfaces are hovered

pressed.description: Background color when branded surfaces are pressed

selected.description: Background color for selected branded surfaces

subtle.description: Subtle branded background for secondary content or hover states

DEFAULT.description: Primary action color used for action like interactive elements.

hovered.description: Color used for action like interactive elements when hovered.

pressed.description: Color used for action like interactive elements when pressed.

selected.description: Background color for selected interactive elements. Use to highlight active/selected interactive states.

subtle.description: Color used for subtle accent backgrounds.

DEFAULT.description: Color used for bold actions like bold interactive elements.

hovered.description: Color used for bold actions like bold interactive elements when hovered.

pressed.description: Color used for bold actions like bold interactive elements when pressed.

DEFAULT.description: Default background color for informational messages and content

hovered.description: Background color when informational surfaces are hovered

pressed.description: Background color when informational surfaces are pressed

selected.description: Background color for selected informational surfaces

subtle.description: Subtle background for secondary informational content

DEFAULT.description: High contrast background for important informational content

hovered.description: High contrast background for important informational content when hovered

pressed.description: High contrast background for important informational content when pressed

DEFAULT.description: Default background color for success messages and positive states

hovered.description: Background color when success surfaces are hovered

pressed.description: Background color when success surfaces are pressed

selected.description: Background color for selected success surfaces

subtle.description: Subtle background for secondary success content

DEFAULT.description: High contrast background for important success content

hovered.description: High contrast background for important success content when hovered

pressed.description: High contrast background for important success content when pressed

DEFAULT.description: Default background color for warning messages and cautionary states

hovered.description: Background color when warning surfaces are hovered

pressed.description: Background color when warning surfaces are pressed

selected.description: Background color for selected warning surfaces

subtle.description: Subtle background for secondary warning content

DEFAULT.description: High contrast background for important warning content

hovered.description: High contrast background for important warning content when hovered

pressed.description: High contrast background for important warning content when pressed

DEFAULT.description: Default background color for error messages and dangerous states

hovered.description: Background color when error surfaces are hovered

pressed.description: Background color when error surfaces are pressed

selected.description: Background color for selected error surfaces

subtle.description: Subtle background for secondary error content

DEFAULT.description: High contrast background for important error content

hovered.description: High contrast background for important error content when hovered

pressed.description: High contrast background for important error content when pressed

DEFAULT.description: Default border color for non-interactive elements like dividers, separators, and layout containers.

hovered.description: Border color when non-interactive elements are hovered

pressed.description: Border color when non-interactive elements are pressed

focused.description: Border color for focus rings on interactive elements. Critical for keyboard navigation and accessibility.

selected.description: Border color for selected interactive elements. Use to highlight active/selected interactive states.

disabled.description: Border color for disabled interactive elements. Shows that interaction is not available.

subtle.description: Border color for non-interactive components like sidebars, headers, cards, and alerts. Provides visual structure without drawing attention.

subtlest.description: Most subtle border color for non-interactive elements like separators within cards or panels.

DEFAULT.description: High contrast border color for strong visual boundaries on non-interactive containers.

hovered.description: High contrast border color for strong visual boundaries on non-interactive containers when hovered

pressed.description: High contrast border color for strong visual boundaries on non-interactive containers when pressed

DEFAULT.description: Border color for use on dark/inverse backgrounds. Maintains visual hierarchy when the background color is inverted.

hovered.description: Border color for use on dark/inverse backgrounds when hovered

pressed.description: Border color for use on dark/inverse backgrounds when pressed

DEFAULT.description: Border color for interactive branded elements.

hovered.description: Border color for interactive branded elements when hovered

pressed.description: Border color for interactive branded elements when pressed

subtle.description: Subtle border color for interactive branded elements

DEFAULT.description: Border color for interactive accent elements.

hovered.description: Border color for interactive accent elements when hovered

pressed.description: Border color for interactive accent elements when pressed

subtle.description: Subtle border color for interactive accent elements

DEFAULT.description: Border color for interactive informational elements.

hovered.description: Border color for interactive informational elements when hovered

pressed.description: Border color for interactive informational elements when pressed

subtle.description: Subtle border color for interactive informational elements

DEFAULT.description: Border color for interactive success elements.

hovered.description: Border color for interactive success elements when hovered

pressed.description: Border color for interactive success elements when pressed

subtle.description: Subtle border color for interactive success elements

DEFAULT.description: Border color for interactive warning elements.

hovered.description: Border color for interactive warning elements when hovered

pressed.description: Border color for interactive warning elements when pressed

subtle.description: Subtle border color for interactive warning elements

DEFAULT.description: Border color for interactive error elements.

hovered.description: Border color for interactive error elements when hovered

pressed.description: Border color for interactive error elements when pressed

subtle.description: Subtle border color for interactive error elements

axis.description: Color for axis lines and labels

display.description: Tight line height for display text

ui.description: UI line height for UI text

prose.description: Normal line height for prose text

code.description: Loose line height for code text

1.description: The style for page titles in prose

2.description: The style for 2nd level headings in prose

3.description: The style for 3rd level headings in prose

4.description: The style for 4th level headings in prose

5.description: The style for 5th level headings in prose

6.description: The style for 6th level headings in prose

DEFAULT.description: The default text style for display text

1.description: The style for page titles in UI

2.description: The style for 2nd level headings in UI. Used for major section headers, modal titles, and primary content areas within a page

3.description: The style for 3rd level headings in UI. Used for subsection headers, card titles, and group headings within major sections

4.description: The style for 4th level headings in UI. Used for form section labels, sidebar navigation categories, and minor content divisions

5.description: The style for 5th level headings in UI. Used for list group headers, dropdown section labels, and nested navigation items

6.description: The style for 6th level headings in UI. Used for small widget titles, inline section labels, and minor UI element headers

DEFAULT.description: The default text style for display text in UI
The default text style for UI text

meta.description: The text style for meta text

DEFAULT.description: The default text style for prose text

lead.description: The text style for lead text

DEFAULT.description: The default text style for code text
